eng.no_links_ind: Links and contacts are not allowed.
eng.rule1: 1. Be a concise problem statement that addresses your emotional discomfort.
eng.rule3: 3. Not contain personal information like phone numbers, etc.
eng.add_failed_ind: Couldn't add. We are fixing this, please try again later.

bm.no_links_ind: Pautan dan maklumat peribadi tidak dibenarkan.
bm.rule1: 1. Tajuk luahan atau masalah dalam satu pernyataan ringkas.
bm.rule3: 3. Tidak mengandungi maklumat peribadi seperti nombor telefon, dsb.
bm.add_failed_ind: Gagal menambah. Kami sedang membaiki, sila cuba sebentar lagi.
